title: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
Sour cream, shredded cheese, and salsa, for serving
instructions: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saut√© chicken, onion, and bell pepper in olive oil until chicken is no longer pink and vegetables are tender.
Add chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, and salt, and stir to combine.
Warm tortillas according to package instructions.
Serve chicken and vegetable mixture in warm tortillas, topped with sour cream, shredded cheese, and salsa as desired.
